long_description: The Motorola Talkabout MD200R 2-way radios offer solid, functional performance inside their sleek and handsome exteriors. Large, strategically placed buttons are easy to operate, even with gloves. Features include 22 channels, volume control, auto squelch, backlit display, battery meter and 10 call tones. 3 AAA NiMH rechargeable batteries (included) offer up to 12 hrs. of use; 3 AAA alkaline batteries (sold separately) offer up to 29 hrs. of use. Motorola Talkabout MD200R 2-way radios communicate up to 20 mi., per manufacturer (with an unobstructed line of sight between you and another radio in good weather).
short_description: The Motorola Talkabout MD200R 2-way radios offer solid, functional performance inside their sleek and handsome exteriors. Large, strategically placed buttons are easy to operate, even with gloves.
